meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be demonstrated.
meanings.sent1: Her demonstrabilities in science class impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent2: The demonstrabilities of the experiment were clear to everyone.
meanings.sent3: His demonstrabilities in magic tricks amazed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The demonstrabilities of her argument shone through in the debate.
meanings.sent5: The demonstrabilities of the puzzle solution were evident to all.

meanings.definition: The ability to be proven or shown.
meanings.sent1: The demonstrabilities of the theory were questioned by the researchers.
meanings.sent2: His demonstrabilities in solving math problems were exceptional.
meanings.sent3: The cat's demonstrabilities in catching mice were put to the test.
meanings.sent4: The demonstrabilities of the new technology amazed the audience.
meanings.sent5: The demonstrabilities of the concept were illustrated with clear examples.
